org.kitodo.data.database.persistence

Class BaseDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitodo.data.database.persistence.BaseDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchDAO, DocketDAO, FilterDAO, HistoryDAO, LdapGroupDAO, ProcessDAO, ProjectDAO, ProjectFileGroupDAO, PropertyDAO, RulesetDAO, TaskDAO, TemplateDAO, UserDAO, UserGroupDAO, WorkpieceDAO

    public abstract class BaseDAO
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Base class for DAOs. This class defines common CRUD methods.

    Changes have been made by Steffen Hankiewicz with later changes by Beatrycze Kmiec

    Author:
    Nick Heudecker <nick@systemmobile.com>, Steffen Hankiewicz <steffen.hankiewicz@intranda.com>, Beatrycze Kmiec <beatrycze.kmiec@slub-dresden.de>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • rollback

        protected static void rollback()
                        throws DAOException
        Performs a rollback on the current session. Exceptions are logged.
        Throws:
        DAOException - if the current session can't be retrieved or an exception is thrown while performing the rollback.
